Operators First, Investors Second.

Mid-market companies ($25-250M revenue, $5-30M EBITDA) partner with Amalgam Capital because we've built, operated, and scaled businesses. Our hands-on approach delivers sustainable growth through operational excellence.

Unicorn companies accelerated

MechanAir: Our Platform in Action

National HVAC & Plumbing Services Platform

In 2021, we partnered with Delos Capital to form MechanAir, bringing together State Mechanical Services (Illinois) and Hampton Roads Mechanical (Virginia) – regional leaders with impressive client rosters including Amazon, Nobu Hotels, and NASA. Under our guidance, MechanAir has implemented shared estimating technology, launched 24/7 service teams, and executed on strategic add-on acquisitions – demonstrating our thesis of preserving regional brands while building national capabilities.

Learn About MechanAir
